post.author: Julie
post.content:
Dear COSKA MEMBERS:

METAMAGE Corp., announces Understanding Web Design, an evening training
course that is the first in a series of corporate training classes designed
to help business and individuals grasp the fundamental and techniques of
building a web site. This introductory course is taught by professional web
developers with instructional backgrounds. Understanding Web Design is aimed
to give business professionals and individuals a hands on approach to
understanding the techniques, software and terminologies of web design hence
increasing their communication level with IT / Internet professionals.

The course runs every Tuesday and Thursday evening for two weeks. Each,',ss
runs three hours between 6PM and 9PM for a total of 12hours of interactive
and instructional training. Snacks will be served at each class along with
coffee and cold drinks. To learn more about METAMAGE and the course or to
sign up for our next class, visit http://www.metamagecorp.com/training

Class starts October 9th, 2001 (through to October 23rd)
Space is limited.

Thank you.

Julie Lee.

PS. Please pass it over to friends who are interested.


100 Adelaide St.W.
Suite #300, Toronto
Ontario. M5H 1S3

Tel. (416) 924-3766
Fax. (416) 924-9607
www.metamagecorp.com
post.title: Announcement
